title: Ashley Roberts
summary:
Ashley Roberts (born September 14, 1981) is an American singer, dancer, and media personality. She is a member of the pop/R&B girl group and dance ensemble The Pussycat Dolls.
Roberts released her debut solo studio album, Butterfly Effect, in 2014. She has appeared on various British television shows, including I'm a Celebrity...Get Me Out of Here! (2012), Dancing on Ice (2013–2014), Ant & Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway (2013–2016), The Jump (2015), Strictly Come Dancing (2018), and Blankety Blank (2022).Roberts is currently a presenter on Global's Heart 00s. She is also a showbiz reporter for Heart FM's Breakfast show with Jamie Theakston and Amanda Holden. She also hosted the Netflix show Dance Monsters.
